title: 820-02016 no charging
message:
the macbook work fine with battery, not charging, not voltage on charging port.
when charger connection PPBUS is 1.5v no short of course.
all the CHGR lines is 0v no short.
changing ports don't do the work.

title: 820-02016 no charging
message:
What shows USB-C meter?
Do you get any voltage at FF200/1 and R5220?

Any history available?

title: 820-02016 no charging
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 94928, member: 682"]
What shows USB-C meter?
[/QUOTE]
nothing black screen,.

FF200/1 and R5200 0v - no short

title: 820-02016 no charging
message:
Check diode mode to ground at pins CC1/2 of UF400/500.
Also at FF200/1 and R5220.

title: 820-02016 no charging
message:
"nothing black screen"
How do you get 1.5V at PPBUS_G3H then?

What about PPVBUS_USBC0/1?
Check voltage and diode mode.
DF602/22 may be bad.

title: 820-02016 no charging
message:
"DF602/22 may be bad."
Remove and test again.
Can also be the CD3217 chips (UF400/500).

Tell the client to use ORIGINAL charger...
